LIBFLIAPI FLIGetStepperPosition

(flidev_t dev, long* position)

Get the stepper motor position of a given device.

Documentation

Get the stepper motor position of a given device. Use this function to read the stepper motor position of filter wheel or focuser dev.
Parameters:
dev - Filter wheel or focuser device handle.
position - Pointer to where the postion of the stepper motor will be placed.
Returns:
Zero on success.
Non-zero on failure.
See Also:
FLIStepMotor
